org.gwt.mosaic.core.client.util
Class DelayedRunnable

java.lang.Object
  org.gwt.mosaic.core.client.util.DelayedRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoreConstants
public abstract class DelayedRunnable
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoreConstants

A helper class for delayed execution based on com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer.

Example: 

 new DelayedRunnable() {
   @Override
   public void run() {
    maximize(WindowState.NORMAL);
   }
 };

Author:
georgopoulos.georgios(at)gmail.com

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface org.gwt.mosaic.core.client.CoreConstants
DEFAULT_DELAY_MILLIS, MIN_DELAY_MILLIS
 
Constructor Summary
DelayedRunnable()
          Creates a com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer and calls com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer#schedule(int) with the default CoreConstants.DEFAULT_DELAY_MILLIS value.
DelayedRunnable(int delayMillis)
          Creates a com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer and calls com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer#schedule(int) with a given value.
 
Method Summary
 void cancel()
          Cancels the timer.
abstract  void run()
          This method will be called when the timer fires.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

DelayedRunnable

public DelayedRunnable()
Creates a com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer and calls com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer#schedule(int) with the default CoreConstants.DEFAULT_DELAY_MILLIS value.

DelayedRunnable

public DelayedRunnable(int delayMillis)
Creates a com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer and calls com.google.gwt.user.client.Timer#schedule(int) with a given value.

Parameters:
delayMillis - how long to wait before the timer elapses, in milliseconds
Method Detail

run

public abstract void run()
This method will be called when the timer fires. Override it to implement the timer's logic.

cancel

public void cancel()
Cancels the timer.
